job.title: Spark / Scala Data Engineer
job.description:
Location: Sunnyvale, CA or Austin, TX Seattle WA
Fulltime
Candidate must be open to relocate post COVID
Experience in developing Big Data applications using java, Scala, python, Spark, Hive, Kafka, apache airflow
Strong analytical and interpersonal skills. Should be highly motivated and ability to learn quick
7-10 years with min 5 years experience & In-depth understanding of data structures and algorithms
Designing and building dimensional data models to improve accessibility, efficiency, and quality of data
Database development experience with Relational or MPP/distributed systems such as Oracle/Teradata/Vertica/HANA/Hadoop/
Programming experience in building high quality applications, data pipelines and analytics solutions.
Experience in working with frameworks, transpilers, code generators
Should be proficient in writing Advanced SQLs, Expertise in performance tuning of SQLs.
Exposure to cloud methodologies and experience with AWS preferred
